Room.Name: Oceancrest Avenue
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Oceancrest Avenue, listening to the crowd in the Ivanhouse Arena.
Room.LongDescription: The loud cheers of triumph are coming from the Ivanhouse Sporting Facility located to the south of the road. The large facility is geared primarily towards one-on-one combat. On the north side of the road are a number of small shops and stores. Further to the east, you can see the intersection of Oceancrest Avenue with Lankshire Parkway.
